resources.string: In Accordance with city of Orlando we promise to adhere to all safety protocols in line with the guidelines laid out to use by the local government. If there should be any breach of this contract, R3cycle is therefore held responsible along with any involved parties.

We encourage Orlando to become a more economically friendly environment. Due to the rise of industrialization and expansion, the lack of preserving nature, litter prevention, and ethical waste disposal is extremely harmful to both the environment and human health. This app aims to be a step in a long process for Orlandoâ€™s citizens and government to become proactive on these economical issues to solve.
